trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.
trans-unit.target: 提供包含單一內容，以及具有標頭的所有控制項的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: HeaderedContentControl inherits the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> and defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> property that is of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl 繼承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>型別的<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> provides a heading for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>提供控制項的標題。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> can be any type.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>可以是任何類型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects, which inherit from HeaderedContentControl.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>物件，繼承自 HeaderedContentControl。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> has <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects as the content in both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>: the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>; the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>具有<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件兩者中的內容當做<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>︰<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>包含<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>;<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> is set to a string and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> is set to a single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>的第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>是設為字串，而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>設定為單一<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl with different types in the Header property A HeaderedContentControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl 中支援的不同類型的標頭屬性 HeaderedContentControl 具有有限的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: An application developer can create a HeaderedContentControl, but its appearance will be very simple.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式開發人員可以建立 HeaderedContentControl，但其外觀可能會非常簡單。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: A HeaderedContentControl is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers.
trans-unit.target: HeaderedContentControl 可用於建立自訂控制項，因為它提供單一標頭的內容控制項的模型。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the header is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出標頭是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>屬性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HasHeader*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used for the header of each control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於每個控制項標題的資料。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the Header can be any type.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，標頭可以是任何類型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> uses the same logic to display the Header that is described in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>使用相同的邏輯，以顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所述的標頭</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A header object.
trans-unit.target: 標頭物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: HeaderStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStringFormat 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, the HeaderStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，則會忽略 HeaderStringFormat 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**|None |

trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示控制項的標頭的內容的範本。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 屬性項目用法 # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*下列其中之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*識別範本所要求的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中現有的資源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 屬性項目語法是可行，但不是建議。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[內嵌樣式和樣板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 繫結參考使用，或是也是可行的但不常見。

trans-unit.source: A data template.
trans-unit.target: 資料範本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供自訂邏輯以選擇用來顯示標頭的範本資料範本選擇器。

trans-unit.source: If both the HeaderTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the template selector property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個 HeaderTemplateSelector 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定，則會忽略範本選取器屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from that implements a practical override.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*的類別衍生自實作實際覆寫。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將自訂類別對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*下列其中之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*識別選取器實作所要求的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考衍生類別中實作實際<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>覆寫。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將自訂類別對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也以程式設計方式加入的執行個體您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>類別作為資源字典中的資源。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>
